item.title: Using Packer to deploy a image on Google Cloud
item.description: Packer is an open source tool that enables you to create identical machine images for multiple platforms from a single source template. A common use case is creating “golden images” that teams across an organization can use in cloud infrastructure. There 2 ways to write the packer code to build the image Using JSON formatted code Using HCL2 formatted code In order to interact with Google cloud we have to create a service account in GCP
